page.title: 01STAUNTON ON WYE
page.content: STAUNTON ON WYE The area includes the scattered parishes of Staunton(pop370) Byford(pop84) Monnington(39) and Mansell Gamage(61). They lie either side of but not on the A438 Hereford-Brecon road. There are Anglican churches at Staunton, Byford and Monnington and a Methodist chapel at Staunton. All other amenities are at Staunton-post office, shop, pubs(3), school and doctors surgery. Both Byford and Staunton have village halls where local functions are held. The main industry is farming but there are several small businesses in Staunton. Included in Staunton are the hamlets of Duck Street, Little London, and Worldsend.
